original_text: So when he came to Galilee, the Galileans welcomed him, having seen all that he had done in Jerusalem at the feast. For they too had gone to the feast.
korean_text: 갈릴리에 이르시매 갈릴리인들이 그를 영접하니 이는 자기들도 명절에 갔다가 예수께서 명절중 예루살렘에서 하신 모든 일을 보았음이더라

sentences.original_text: So when he came to Galilee
having seen all that he had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 행한 모든 것을 보았기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: For they too had gone to the feast
